Name: hypopyon
Definition: A corneal ulcer that is characterized by infiltrate formation in the marginal zone that is parallel but separated from the limbus.

Name: glaucomatocyclitic crisis
Definition: A syndrome that is a chronic unilateral (or rarely bilateral) iridocyclitis appearing with the triad of heterochromia

Name: obsolete glaucoma with ocular inflammation
Definition: A syndrome that is a chronic unilateral (or rarely bilateral) iridocyclitis appearing with the triad of heterochromia

Name: gonococcal iridocyclitis
Definition: A syndrome that is a chronic unilateral (or rarely bilateral) iridocyclitis appearing with the triad of heterochromia

Name: obsolete gonococcal eye infectious disease
Definition: A syndrome that is a chronic unilateral (or rarely bilateral) iridocyclitis appearing with the triad of heterochromia

Name: lens-induced iridocyclitis
Definition: A syndrome that is a chronic unilateral (or rarely bilateral) iridocyclitis appearing with the triad of heterochromia

Name: infectious anterior uveitis
